H0.text: Methanogens act as decomposers in sewage treatment plants.

H1.text: Creators are methanogens that act in sewage treatment plants.

H2.text: Fertilizers are what methanogens act as in sewage treatment plants.

H3.text: Killers are what methanogens act as in sewage treatment plants.

A4.text: Methanogens are widely used in anaerobic digestors to treat wastewater as well as aqueous organic pollutants.

A5.text: Methanogens also effectively decrease the concentration of organic matter in wastewater run-off.
